shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user becomes offline.

dlentry.dd: Since v3.0.0, this callback has been deprecated. Please use instead.

section.p: Occurs when a remote user's audio stream playback pauses/resumes.
This callback is triggered by the remote user calling the method to turn off or turn on audio transmission.
section.note: @note This callback does not work properly when the number of users (in the `COMMUNICATION` profile) or hosts (in the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile) in the channel exceeds 17.

plentry.pd:
Sets whether to mute the media resource:
true: Muted.
false: Unmuted.
